title: Ticket #3495: nordugrid_gahp shouldn't abort on bad user input
description:
On a job submission request, the nordugrid_gahp parses the job description RSL using the Globus library in order to modify it. If the parsing call fails, the gahp blows an assert(). This is bad, especially since a parse failure can be caused by the user via the NordugridRSL job attribute.

On a parse failure, the nordugrid_gahp should return a failure result for the request, with a suitable error message.
